titles.title: To include geriatrics and gerontology in the definition of "primary health services" under the National Health Service Corps program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 12/27/2012--Introduced. Caring for an Aging America Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to include geriatrics and gerontology within the definition of "primary health services" for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.
